definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: For the study, published in the September issue of Pediatrics, researchers identified 28 babies who spent time in the NICU and were later diagnosed with an autism spectrum disorder.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在九月份的《儿科》杂志上面。

sentences.english: But usually in January you can't do it because it's too cold.
sentences.chinese: 但通常在一月份不能做，因为太冷了。

sentences.english: February was definitely not a good month for the automobile industry in America.
sentences.chinese: 二月份铁定是美国汽车工业销售惨淡的一个月。

sentences.english: In May, we reported about a new album from singer Josh Groban.
sentences.chinese: 五月份，我们报道过一张乔许葛洛班的新专辑。

sentences.english: 'months' returns an mirrored array with the month-numbers of the year.
sentences.chinese: 返回一年里月份数的镜像数组。

sentences.english: The bins will be installed in central London and Liverpool in October.
sentences.chinese: 十月份，这种垃圾桶将被安装在伦敦市中心和利物浦。

sentences.english: The Syrian government launched a violent campaign against pro-democracy protesters in March.
sentences.chinese: 叙利亚政府三月份对主张民主的示威者展开暴力镇压。

sentences.english: The long-haired OA-Puss will celebrate her 24th birthday in January — much to the  astonishment of Quentin Shaw, who has owned her since 1987.
sentences.chinese: 这只长毛猫猫，即将在一月份迎来自己的24岁生日。

sentences.english: The training of Air Defence Battalion’s officers and non-commissioned officers will be started in September, using the delivered equipment.
sentences.chinese: 9月份，将开始对防空营的军官士兵进行训练。

sentences.english: His term of appointment expires in August.
Coincidently, all of my family members were born in the same month.
sentences.chinese: 很凑巧的，我们全家都是同一个月份出生的。

sentences.english: In March, Hareton had had an accident and been confined to the farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 三月份，哈里顿发生了一起事故，并被囚禁在了农舍。

sentences.english: The curriculum centred on the extra class of winter vacation in January.
sentences.chinese: 一月份的课程集中在寒假的加课上。

sentences.english: The gathering will be next February in Rome.
sentences.chinese: 该会议将在明年二月份在罗马举行。

sentences.english: Month seven is also the month when the Lamaze classes begin.
sentences.chinese: 个月还是开始上无痛分娩课的月份。

sentences.english: The school will enroll new students in August.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校将于八月份招收新生。

definition: start of month/early in the month
end of month/late in the month
